LanguageData.MoyoPressurePod_Race.label: pressurepod
LanguageData.MoyoPressurePod_Race.description: A mining mechanoid used in the Lighthouse. A pair of giant 'club' is utilized to crush rocks to mine ores. One of few mechanoid that can be used on land, it strikes the foe with its club when in combat. You will not want to be on that recieving end.
LanguageData.MoyoPressurePod_Race.tools.0.label: head
LanguageData.MoyoPressurePod_Race.tools.1.label: left club
LanguageData.MoyoPressurePod_Race.tools.2.label: right club
LanguageData.MoyoHexaPod_Race.label: hexapod
LanguageData.MoyoHexaPod_Race.description: A multipurpose mechanoid used in the Lighthouse. 6 flexible tentacles allows it to do multiple activities. One of few mechanoid that can be used on land, it utilizes its tentacles to strike and constrict an opponent's movement in combat.
LanguageData.MoyoHexaPod_Race.tools.0.label: head
LanguageData.MoyoHexaPod_Race.tools.1.label: tentacle
LanguageData.MoyoHexaPod_Race.tools.2.label: tentacle
LanguageData.MoyoHexaPod_Race.tools.3.label: tentacle
LanguageData.MoyoHexaPod_Race.tools.4.label: tentacle
LanguageData.MoyoHexaPod_Race.tools.5.label: tentacle
LanguageData.MoyoHexaPod_Race.tools.6.label: tentacle
LanguageData.MoyoCryoPod_Race.label: cryopod
LanguageData.MoyoCryoPod_Race.description: A multipurpose mechanoid used in the Lighthouse. 6 flexible tentacles allows it to do multiple activities. A modified hexapod with cryonic weapon for mid-range fire support. It retains it's close combat capabilities even after modification.
LanguageData.MoyoCryoPod_Race.tools.0.label: head
LanguageData.MoyoCryoPod_Race.tools.1.label: tentacle
LanguageData.MoyoCryoPod_Race.tools.2.label: tentacle
LanguageData.MoyoCryoPod_Race.tools.3.label: tentacle
LanguageData.MoyoCryoPod_Race.tools.4.label: tentacle
LanguageData.MoyoCryoPod_Race.tools.5.label: tentacle
LanguageData.MoyoCryoPod_Race.tools.6.label: tentacle
